description: Shubman Gill's journey from a Punjab farm to leading India in Tests is a testament to his father's unwavering belief and sacrifices. Recognizing his son's talent at a young age, his father moved the family to Chandigarh and created rigorous training schedules.

description: While top-down measures such as the use of Wolbachia mosquitoes are showing promise, they are hampered by high costs; at present personal protection and community mobilisation offer the best ways to combat Aedes mosquitoes and the diseases they transmit

title: The hands behind the golu dolls of Bommaikara Theru in Kancheepuram
description: Asthagiri street, known as Bommaikara Theru, in Kancheepuram was once filled with doll makers whose craft defined Navaratri. Today, only a handful of families remain, balancing tradition with changing demand and rising expenses.

title: The caste tensions that sparked after T.N. Scheduled Caste activist Immanuel Sekaran’s murder in 1957
description: The events, starting with riots at Mudukulathur, continue to dominate the public discourse. While the Scheduled Castes were among the adversely impacted people, police firing at Keezhathooval, wherein five persons belonging to the Mukkulathors were killed, confounded the situation. Clarity is still not available on every aspect of the episode

A journalist's question about India's poor record at the venue fueled Gill's determination. His match-winning innings not only secured the win but also etched Birmingham as a special chapter in his cricketing journey.

Bolsonaro sentenced to 27yrs: Brazil's SC convicts ex-president for coup attempt
description: Jair Bolsonaro, the former president of Brazil, has been sentenced to 27 years and three months in prison after being convicted by the Supreme Court for attempting a coup following his 2022 electoral defeat. The unprecedented ruling has sparked international backlash, particularly from the US, while inflaming political tensions within Brazil, with supporters claiming political persecution. Despite the ruling, Bolsonaro remains an influential figure.

title: The anxious, ‘absent’ migrant voters of Gopalganj
description: Gopalganj district has the highest number of names deleted from the draft electoral list, with voters declared ‘absent’ or ‘permanently shifted’, though many migrants still want to register as electors

title: The Bengal Files Day 7: Vivek Agnihotri's film wraps up first week; earns Rs 11 crore in India
description: Vivek Agnihotri's 'The Bengal Files,' starring Mithun Chakraborty and Anupam Kher, earned Rs 11.25 crore in its first week, with overseas collections adding Rs 2.50 crore. Day 7 saw approximately Rs 1 crore in domestic earnings. While the film's box office performance lags behind Agnihotri's previous hits like 'The Kashmir Files,' it has surpassed 'The Vaccine War.

title: The physics of light-based computers can change the way AI works
description: Recently, two research teams studied nonlinear interactions between intense light pulses passing through glass fibres and uncovered something unusual. They reported that it’s possible to use the physics of light in optical fibres to perform complex AI tasks potentially much faster and with less energy than traditional computers

title: Bhanumathi: a multi-faceted star of Tamil, Telugu cinema
description: Bhanumathi was not just about acting. She directed and produced 16 films and wrote screenplays, dialogues, and scripts. She composed music. She sang all the songs in her films and included one keerthana of Thyagaraja mostly in her Telugu movies

The suspect, Yordanis Cobos-Martinez, a motel employee, has been arrested and charged with capital murder. The gruesome attack reportedly stemmed from a dispute over a broken washing machine.

The Indian Embassy and local administration are assisting the family.

The family's anger escalated after the couple had a child, leading to the brutal attack with iron rods near Sisendi Road. The body was dumped in a drain to conceal evidence.

Pavitra alleges she was forced to provide dowry, support her jobless husband, and financially assist the family's film academy. Police have issued notices to Narayan and his family, directing them to appear for investigation regarding the allegations.

description: In Jayanagar, a love triangle turned deadly when Kiran Gowda, 20, was fatally stabbed during a fight with Jeevan, 20, over Divya, 19. Divya and Kiran were in a relationship after she broke up with Jeevan seven months prior.

Her family suspects foul play, alleging dowry harassment and murder. Police arrested her husband, brother-in-law, and cousin, recovering a dupatta. The husband confessed to disposing of the body in the Ganga after finding her hanging.

Users have already created or modified over 200 million images, leveraging Nano Banana's speed and accuracy. Viral trends showcase the tool's versatility, allowing users to transform themselves into action figures, appear in different decades, and step into famous artworks.
